entry.title: 用Python分析电力系统
entry.summary:
用Python分析电力系统 -- 实验总结，和吐槽¶

这篇文章暂时只是给自己看的，一些细节未予补充。

This article is temporarily not for readers, details overlooked.

前推回代法潮流计算¶

所谓前推回代法，只适用于树形网络，一般是配电网。反映到数据结构里就是树的遍历，从叶到根，再从根到叶。

下面的代码Looks like sh*t，但它确实能用并且具有通用性。

算例使用何书例题11-1，前推使用循环，回代用到了递归。

class node():
    def __init__(self, index, voltage, load, receive_from, send_through):
        self.index = index
        self.receive_from = receive_from
        self

<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="用Python分析电力系统----实验总结，和吐槽">用Python分析电力系统 -- 实验总结，和吐槽<a class="anchor-link" href="#用Python分析电力系统----实验总结，和吐槽">¶</a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>这篇文章暂时只是给自己看的，一些细节未予补充。</p>
<p>This article is temporarily not for readers, details overlooked.</p>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="前推回代法潮流计算">前推回代法潮流计算<a class="anchor-link" href="#前推回代法潮流计算">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>所谓前推回代法，只适用于树形网络，一般是配电网。反映到数据结构里就是树的遍历，从叶到根，再从根到叶。</p>
<p>下面的代码<strong>Looks like sh*t</strong>，但它确实能用并且具有通用性。</p>
<p>算例使用何书<code>例题11-1</code>，前推使用循环，回代用到了递归。</p>
<div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="k">class</span> <span class="nc">node</span><span class="p">():</span>
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="fm">__init__</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">voltage</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">load</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">receive_from</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">send_through</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">index</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">receive_from</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">receive_from</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">send_through</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">send_through</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">send_through_for_iter</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">send_through</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">voltage</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">voltage</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">received_power</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load</span>
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">update_power_flow</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">received_power</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span>\
            <span class="o">+</span><span class="nb">sum</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">each</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transfer_power</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">each</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">send_through</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">reset</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">send_through_for_iter</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">send_through</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">update_voltage</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">net</span> <span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">current_edge</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">voltage</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">abs</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">net</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">current_edge</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">source_node_index</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">voltage</span>\
                       <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">current_edge</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">voltage_loss</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">class</span> <span class="nc">edge</span><span class="p">():</span>
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="fm">__init__</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">impedance</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">connect_to</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">impedance</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">impedance</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">source_node_index</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">connect_to</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_node_index</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">connect_to</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">power_loss</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">voltage_loss</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transfer_power</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">update_power_flow</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">net</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="n">send_power</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">net</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_node_index</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">received_power</span>
        <span class="n">voltage</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">net</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_node_index</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">voltage</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">power_loss</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">impedance</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="nb">abs</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">send_power</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">voltage</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transfer_power</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">power_loss</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">send_power</span>
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">update_voltage</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">voltage</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">voltage_loss</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transfer_power</span>\
             <span class="o">*</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">impedance</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">conjugate</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">voltage</span>

<span class="n">edge1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">edge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.54</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mf">0.65j</span><span class="p">,[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">edge2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">edge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.62</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mf">0.5j</span><span class="p">,[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">edge3</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">edge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.6</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mf">0.35j</span><span class="p">,[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">edge4</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">edge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.72</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mf">0.75j</span><span class="p">,[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">edge5</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">edge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">1.0</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mf">0.55j</span><span class="p">,[</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">edge6</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">edge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.65</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mf">0.35j</span><span class="p">,[</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">edge7</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">edge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.9</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mf">0.5j</span><span class="p">,[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">edges</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">edge1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">edge2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">edge3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">edge4</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">edge5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">edge6</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">edge7</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">node1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">node</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">10.5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">None</span> <span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="n">edge1</span><span class="p">})</span>
<span class="n">node2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">node</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">10.5</span><span class="p">,(</span><span class="mf">0.6</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mf">0.45j</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">edge1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="n">edge2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">edge4</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">edge7</span><span class="p">})</span>
<span class="n">node3</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">node</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">10.5</span><span class="p">,(</span><span class="mf">0.4</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mf">0.3j</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">edge2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="n">edge3</span><span class="p">})</span>
<span class="n">node4</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">node</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">10.5</span><span class="p">,(</span><span class="mf">0.4</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mf">0.28j</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">edge3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="n">node5</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">node</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,(</span><span class="mf">0.6</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mf">0.4j</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">edge4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="n">edge5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">edge6</span><span class="p">})</span>
<span class="n">node6</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">node</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,(</span><span class="mf">0.4</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mf">0.3j</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">edge5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="n">node7</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">node</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,(</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mf">0.4j</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">edge6</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="n">node8</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">node</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,(</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mf">0.35j</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">edge7</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="n">nodes</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">node1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">node2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">node3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">node4</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">node5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">node6</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">node7</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">node8</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">leaf_node</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">each</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">each</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">nodes</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="n">each</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">send_through</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">update_voltage</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">source_node</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">current_edge</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">current_node</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">current_edge</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_voltage</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">source_node</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">voltage</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">current_node</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_voltage</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">nodes</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">current_edge</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">current_edge</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">current_node</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">send_through_for_iter</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">source_node</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">current_node</span>
        <span class="n">current_node</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">nodes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">current_edge</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">user_node_index</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">update_voltage</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">source_node</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">current_edge</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">current_node</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">iter_count</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
<span class="k">while</span> <span class="bp">True</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">V</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">each</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">voltage</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">each</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">nodes</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">S</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">each</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transfer_power</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">each</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">edges</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">nodeiter</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">leaf_node</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="n">current_node</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">nodeiter</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pop</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="k">while</span> <span class="bp">True</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">current_edge</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">current_node</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">receive_from</span>
        <span class="n">source_node</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">nodes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">current_edge</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">source_node_index</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">current_edge</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_power_flow</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">nodes</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">source_node</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_power_flow</span><span class="p">()</span>
        <span class="n">source_node</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">send_through_for_iter</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">remove</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">current_edge</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">source_node</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">send_through_for_iter</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="k">try</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">current_node</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">nodeiter</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pop</span><span class="p">()</span>
            <span class="k">except</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'unexpected iteration error.'</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">source_node</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">receive_from</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">current_node</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">source_node</span>
        <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">each</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">nodes</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="n">each</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset</span><span class="p">()</span>
            <span class="k">break</span>
    <span class="n">update_voltage</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">source_node</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">current_edge</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">current_node</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="nb">max</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="nb">abs</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">vn</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">vn_1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">vn</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">vn_1</span> <span class="ow">in</span>\
            <span class="nb">zip</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">each</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">voltage</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">each</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">nodes</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">V</span><span class="p">)])</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mf">1e-6</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">iter_count</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">iter_count</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">50</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'该系统不收敛'</span><span class="p">);</span><span class="k">break</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">V</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">each</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">voltage</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">each</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">nodes</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">S</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">each</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transfer_power</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">each</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">edges</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="k">break</span>
<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'每个节点电压：</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">V</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'每条支路功率：</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">S</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="水火电厂功率的经济分配">水火电厂功率的经济分配<a class="anchor-link" href="#水火电厂功率的经济分配">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>算例使用何书<code>例题14-4</code>，这个程序不具有通用性，<strong>就算用建模的思想写个通用程序，就算再花费十个小时去想怎么写，和别人把程序当计算器写出来的<code>结果</code>也是一样的，这里的<code>结果</code>不单单指程序运行结果</strong>。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">sympy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">s</span>
<span class="n">s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">init_printing</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">use_unicode</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">wrap_line</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">print_builtin</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">var</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'P_T,P_H,gamma,P_LD'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[1]:</div>
<div class="output_latex output_subarea output_execute_result">
$$\left ( P_{T}, \quad P_{H}, \quad \gamma, \quad P_{LD}\right )$$
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [2]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">F</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">3</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mf">0.4</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">P_T</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mf">0.00035</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">P_T</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span>
<span class="n">W</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mf">0.8</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">P_H</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mf">0.0015</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">P_H</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span>
<span class="n">dFdp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diff</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">F</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">P_T</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">dWdp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diff</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">W</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">P_H</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">load_dist</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">solve</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">dFdp</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">gamma</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">dWdp</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">P_T</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">P_H</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">P_LD</span><span class="p">],[</span><span class="n">P_T</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">P_H</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">load_dist</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[3]:</div>
<div class="output_latex output_subarea output_execute_result">
$$\left \{ P_{H} : \frac{7.0 P_{LD} - 8000.0 \gamma + 4000.0}{30.0 \gamma + 7.0}, \quad P_{T} : \frac{10.0}{30.0 \gamma + 7.0} \left(3.0 P_{LD} \gamma + 800.0 \gamma - 400.0\right)\right \}$$
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [4]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">W_sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">g</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">ph</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">load_dist</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">P_H</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">subs</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="n">P_LD</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">pld</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">gamma</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">g</span><span class="p">})</span> \
          <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">pld</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">350</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">700</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">]]</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">W</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">subs</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="n">P_H</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="p">})</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">3600</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">interval</span> \
               <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">p</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">interval</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">zip</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ph</span><span class="p">,[</span><span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">]))</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [5]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">_gamma</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mf">0.46</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.54</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="k">while</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">res</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">W_sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">_gamma</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">_gamma</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nb">bool</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">res</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mf">1.5e7</span><span class="p">)]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">_gamma</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="mi">2</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="nb">abs</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">res</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mf">1.5e7</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="k">break</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [6]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="n">g</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">_gamma</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="mi">2</span>
<span class="n">index</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'0~8h'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'8~18'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'18~24'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="s1">'$P_</span><span class="si">{LD}</span><span class="s1">$'</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="mi">350</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">700</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">],</span>
              <span class="s1">'$P_H$'</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="n">load_dist</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">P_H</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">subs</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="n">P_LD</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">pld</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">gamma</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">g</span><span class="p">})</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">pld</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">350</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">700</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">]],</span>
              <span class="s1">'$P_T$'</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="n">load_dist</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">P_T</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">subs</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="n">P_LD</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">pld</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">gamma</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">g</span><span class="p">})</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">pld</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">350</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">700</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">]],},</span>
             <span class="n">index</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">index</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[6]:</div>
<div class="output_html rendered_html output_subarea output_execute_result">

        "    extensions: ['tex2jax.js','mml2jax.js','MathMenu.js','MathZoom.js']," +
        "    displayAlign: 'center'," +
        "    displayIndent: '0em'," +
        "    showMathMenu: true," +
        "    tex2jax: { " +
        "        inlineMath: [ ['$','$'] ], " +
        "        displayMath: [ ['$$','$$'] ]," +
        "        processEscapes: true," +
        "        preview: 'TeX'," +
        "    }, " +
        "    'HTML-CSS': { " +
        " linebreaks: { automatic: true, width: '95% container' }, " +
        "        styles: { '.MathJax_Display, .MathJax .mo, .MathJax .mi, .MathJax .mn': {color: 'black ! important'} }" +
        "    } " +
        "}); ";
    (document.body || document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]).appendChild(mathjaxscript);
}
</script>

entry.title: PyPSA在电力系统分析中的应用
entry.summary:
PyPSA 在电力系统分析中的应用¶

Python语言被广泛应用于科学计算，尤其是当前炒的火热的人工智能领域，实际上，除了人工智能，在电力系统中，Python也可以发挥作用。

几个用于电力系统分析的Python程序包¶

目前有以下几个Python Package可用于电力系统分析，不一定会很全，欢迎联系我进行补充。

  • pandapower -- 这个包由德国卡塞尔大学（University of Kassel）和弗劳恩霍夫研究所（Fraunhofer Institute）合作开发，具体可以参考卡塞尔大学网站。
  • PyPSA -- 由康奈尔大学主导开发。
  • PYPOWER -- 这是一个matlab下matpower的Python移植，还有一个基于它的系统暂态稳定性仿真程序PYPOWER-Dynamics
  • GridCal -- 带有图形界面的电力系统分析软件，画面很赞。看下面项目主页的示例图：

  • GridKit -- 由德国的一个SciGRID项目产生，但这个就不是纯粹用Python写成的了。
  • 还有一个国内的PowerFlowCalculation

可以看到在目前Dawn所收集到的信息里，有两个都是德国的，德国的电力工业也的确发达。

用PyPSA进行潮流计算¶

本文主要介绍PyPSA的使用，以何的教材例题11-5作为算例，用Newton-Raphson法进行潮流计算。

在开始前需导入以下包。

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="PyPSA-在电力系统分析中的应用">PyPSA 在电力系统分析中的应用<a class="anchor-link" href="#PyPSA-在电力系统分析中的应用">¶</a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Python语言被广泛应用于科学计算，尤其是当前炒的火热的人工智能领域，实际上，除了人工智能，在电力系统中，Python也可以发挥作用。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="几个用于电力系统分析的Python程序包">几个用于电力系统分析的Python程序包<a class="anchor-link" href="#几个用于电力系统分析的Python程序包">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>目前有以下几个Python Package可用于电力系统分析，不一定会很全，欢迎<a href="/contact">联系我</a>进行补充。</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://github.com/lthurner/pandapower">pandapower</a> -- 这个包由德国卡塞尔大学（University of Kassel）和弗劳恩霍夫研究所（Fraunhofer Institute）合作开发，具体可以参考<a href="https://www.uni-kassel.de/eecs/en/fachgebiete/e2n/software.html">卡塞尔大学网站</a>。</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/PyPSA/PyPSA">PyPSA</a> -- 由<a href="https://arxiv.org/abs/1707.09913">康奈尔大学</a>主导开发。</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/rwl/PYPOWER">PYPOWER</a> -- 这是一个matlab下matpower的Python移植，还有一个基于它的系统暂态稳定性仿真程序<a href="https://github.com/susantoj/PYPOWER-Dynamics">PYPOWER-Dynamics</a></li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/SanPen/GridCal">GridCal</a> -- 带有图形界面的电力系统分析软件，画面很赞。看下面项目主页的示例图：</li>
</ul>
<p><img alt="GridCal示例图" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SanPen/GridCal/master/pics/GridCal.png" /></p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://github.com/bdw/GridKit">GridKit</a> -- 由德国的一个SciGRID项目产生，但这个就不是纯粹用Python写成的了。</li>
<li>还有一个国内的<a href="https://github.com/Maples7/PowerFlowCalculation">PowerFlowCalculation</a></li>
</ul>
<p>可以看到在目前Dawn所收集到的信息里，有两个都是德国的，德国的电力工业也的确发达。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="用PyPSA进行潮流计算">用PyPSA进行潮流计算<a class="anchor-link" href="#用PyPSA进行潮流计算">¶</a></h2><p>本文主要介绍PyPSA的使用，以何的教材<code>例题11-5</code>作为算例，用Newton-Raphson法进行潮流计算。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>在开始前需导入以下包。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pypsa</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">psa</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="初始化网络">初始化网络<a class="anchor-link" href="#初始化网络">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [2]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">net</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">psa</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Network</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'simple_net'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>首先创建一个网络，命名为<code>simple_net</code>，当然也可以为complex net，名字开心就好。下面用一个循环加入4条母线：</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Bus'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Bus </span><span class="si">{}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>然后可以查看各母线的有关参数，对这些参数的详细解释请参考官方文档，这里我们只关心<code>control</code>一栏。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [4]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">buses</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[4]:</div>
<div class="output_html rendered_html output_subarea output_execute_result">
<div>
<style scoped="">
    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {
        vertical-align: middle;
    }

    .dataframe tbody tr th {
        vertical-align: top;
    }

    .dataframe thead th {
        text-align: right;
    }
</style>
<table border="1" class="dataframe">

<th>v_mag_pu_min</th>
<th>v_mag_pu_max</th>
<th>control</th>
<th>sub_network</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<th>Bus 1</th>
<td>1.0</td>
<td></td>
<td>0.0</td>
<td>0.0</td>

<td>1.0</td>

<td>PQ</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>

<td>1.0</td>
<td></td>
<td>0.0</td>
<td>0.0</td>
<td>AC</td>
<td>1.0</td>
<td>0.0</td>
<td>inf</td>
<td>PQ</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<th>Bus 3</th>
<td>1.0</td>
<td></td>
<td>0.0</td>
<td>0.0</td>
<td>AC</td>
<td>1.0</td>
<td>0.0</td>
<td>inf</td>
<td>PQ</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<th>Bus 4</th>
<td>1.0</td>
<td></td>
<td>0.0</td>
<td>0.0</td>
<td>AC</td>
<td>1.0</td>
<td>0.0</td>
<td>inf</td>
<td>PQ</td>
<td></td>
</tr>

</table>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>根据例题<strong>11-5</strong>给定条件，节点3的控制类型应是<code>PV</code>，节点4应为<code>Slack</code>，即松弛节点/平衡节点。
这与上表显示不符，<strong>但先别急着直接改变它们的值</strong>，文档对于<code>control</code>值是这么说的：</p>
<blockquote><p>Note that this attribute is an output inherited from the controls of the generators attached to the bus; setting it directly on the bus will not have any effect.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>也就是说，进行潮流计算时，程序会根据所给条件，自动判断哪些节点是哪些类型，并在计算后作为输出结果。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="参数设置">参数设置<a class="anchor-link" href="#参数设置">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>接下来向各节点添加支路，变压器和发电机,并添加负载。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [5]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Line'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Line 1-2'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">bus0</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Bus 1'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">bus1</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Bus 2'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="n">r</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.4</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">b</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.01528</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Line'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Line 1-4'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">bus0</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Bus 1'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">bus1</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Bus 4'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="n">r</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.12</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">b</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.0192</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Line'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Line 2-4'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">bus0</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Bus 2'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">bus1</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Bus 4'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="n">r</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.08</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.4</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">b</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.01413</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Transformer'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'T_1'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">bus0</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Bus 3'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">bus1</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Bus 1'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="n">model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'pi'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tap_ratio</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">1.1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.3</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="mf">1.1</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Generator'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'G_4'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">bus</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Bus 4'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">control</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Slack'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Generator'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'G_3'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">bus</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Bus 3'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">control</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'PV'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="n">p_set</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Load'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Load 1'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">bus</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Bus 1'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="n">p_set</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">q_set</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.18</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Load'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Load 2'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">bus</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Bus 2'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="n">p_set</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.55</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">q_set</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.13</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>关于上面的代码，有三点需要注意：</p>
<ul>
<li>变压器的变比默认是bus0与bus1的电压之比，即$k = V_{bus0} : V_{bus1}$</li>
<li>PyPSA内部的变压器模型把输入的阻抗和导纳参数认为是归算到低压侧的参数，因此上面需要把参数除以变比平方来归算到低压侧。</li>
<li>连接有发电机的母线（Bus）的控制类型会随发电机的类型而改变。
文档原文是：<blockquote><p>Note that the control strategy for active and reactive power PQ/PV/Slack is set on the generators NOT on the buses.
Buses then inherit the control strategy from the generators attached at the bus (defaulting to PQ if there is no generator
attached). Any PV generator will make the whole bus a PV bus. For PV buses, the voltage magnitude set point is set
on the bus, not the generator, with bus.v_mag_pu_set since it is a bus property.</p>
</blockquote>
</li>
</ul>
<p>因此还需设置3、4节点参数如下：</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [6]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">buses</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Bus 3'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'v_mag_pu_set'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">1.10</span>
<span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">buses</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Bus 4'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'v_mag_pu_set'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">1.05</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="一致性检查——用于排查潜在错误">一致性检查——用于排查潜在错误<a class="anchor-link" href="#一致性检查——用于排查潜在错误">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>至此，算例所给的所有参数都用上了，在进行潮流计算前，运行一致性检查：</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [7]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">consistency_check</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stderr output_text">
<pre>WARNING:pypsa.components:The following transformers have zero r, which could break the linear load flow:
Index(['T_1'], dtype='object')
WARNING:pypsa.components:The following transformers have zero s_nom, which is used to define the impedance and will thus break the load flow:
Index(['T_1'], dtype='object')
WARNING:pypsa.components:The following attributes of the dataframe transformers have the wrong dtype:
Index(['tap_side', 'tap_position'], dtype='object', name='attribute')
They are:
attribute
tap_side        int64
tap_position    int64
dtype: object
but should be:
attribute
tap_side        int32
tap_position    int32
Name: dtype, dtype: object
WARNING:pypsa.components:The following attributes of the dataframe generators have the wrong dtype:
Index(['min_up_time', 'min_down_time', 'initial_status'], dtype='object', name='attribute')
They are:
attribute
min_up_time       int64
min_down_time     int64
initial_status    int64
dtype: object
but should be:
attribute
min_up_time       int32
min_down_time     int32
initial_status    int32
Name: dtype, dtype: object
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>有几条<code>warning</code>，我们能处理的是第二条，这关系的到潮流计算的正确性，至于其他，暂时先不予理会。(<em>其实在写这篇文章时Dawn也还不知道其他<code>warning</code>会有什么影响</em>)</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [8]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#warning处理：设置变压器基准功率</span>
<span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transformers</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">s_nom</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">1.0</span>
<span class="c1">#计算潮流</span>
<span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pf</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stderr output_text">
<pre>INFO:pypsa.pf:Slack bus for sub-network 0 is Bus 4
INFO:pypsa.pf:Performing non-linear load-flow on AC sub-network SubNetwork 0 for snapshots Index(['now'], dtype='object')
INFO:pypsa.pf:Newton-Raphson solved in 3 iterations with error of 0.000000 in 0.015626 seconds
</pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[8]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>{'n_iter':      0
 now  3, 'error':                 0
 now  1.104187e-07, 'converged':         0
 now  True}</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="结果">结果<a class="anchor-link" href="#结果">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>然后显示出结果：</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="input_area">

<span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">buses_t</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">p</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">net</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">buses_t</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q</span>

<h2 id="小结">小结<a class="anchor-link" href="#小结">¶</a></h2>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>以上用一个算例对PyPSA进行了简单介绍，PyPSA还带有一个基于Web的图形界面，效果同样不错，具体可以看看<a href="https://www.pypsa.org/animations/pypsa-eur-30/">这个演示</a>。</p>
<p>除了潮流计算，PyPSA还能进行最优潮流规划(OPF)，更多请参见官方文档</p>
<p>PyPSA的设计比较好，接口清晰，文档完善，不过这个包仍在开发当中，尚不能进行短路计算。</p>

<p>2.PyPSA参考文档：<a href="https://www.pypsa.org/doc/">https://www.pypsa.org/doc/</a></p>
</div>

entry.title: pelican建站小记
entry.summary:
pelican建站小记¶

很早之前就有了建立个人网站的想法，博主是一个非IT行业的人，曾经尝试过django、wordpress，觉得django太繁，wordpress虽然很好，但总觉得太傻瓜化了，而且是php写的，不是博主所熟悉的python。

直到遇到了pelican。

pelican 功能简介¶

下面是从pelican主页上摘下来的。

  • Chronological content (e.g., articles, blog posts) as well as static pages
  • Integration with external services (e.g., Google Analytics and Disqus)
  • Site themes (created using Jinja2 templates)
  • Publication of articles in multiple languages
  • Generation of Atom and RSS feeds
  • Syntax highlighting via Pygments
  • Importing existing content from WordPress, Dotclear, and other services
  • Fast rebuild times due to content caching and selective output writing

<style type="text/css">/*!
*
* IPython notebook
*
*/
/* CSS font colors for translated ANSI colors. */
.ansibold {
  font-weight: bold;
}
/* use dark versions for foreground, to improve visibility */
.ansiblack {
  color: black;
}
.ansired {
  color: darkred;
}
.ansigreen {
  color: darkgreen;
}
.ansiyellow {
  color: #c4a000;
}
.ansiblue {
  color: darkblue;
}
.ansipurple {
  color: darkviolet;
}
.ansicyan {
  color: steelblue;
}
.ansigray {
  color: gray;
}
/* and light for background, for the same reason */
.ansibgblack {
  background-color: black;
}
.ansibgred {
  background-color: red;
}
.ansibggreen {
  background-color: green;
}
.ansibgyellow {
  background-color: yellow;
}
.ansibgblue {
  background-color: blue;
}
.ansibgpurple {
  background-color: magenta;
}
.ansibgcyan {
  background-color: cyan;
}
.ansibggray {
  background-color: gray;
}
div.cell {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  border-radius: 2px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
  border-width: 1px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: transparent;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 5px;
  /* This acts as a spacer between cells, that is outside the border */
  margin: 0px;
  outline: none;
  border-left-width: 1px;
  padding-left: 5px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, transparent -40px, transparent 1px, transparent 1px, transparent 100%);
}
div.cell.jupyter-soft-selected {
  border-left-color: #90CAF9;
  border-left-color: #E3F2FD;
  border-left-width: 1px;
  padding-left: 5px;
  border-right-color: #E3F2FD;
  border-right-width: 1px;
  background: #E3F2FD;
}
@media print {
  div.cell.jupyter-soft-selected {
    border-color: transparent;
  }
}
div.cell.selected {
  border-color: #ababab;
  border-left-width: 0px;
  padding-left: 6px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #42A5F5 -40px, #42A5F5 5px, transparent 5px, transparent 100%);
}
@media print {
  div.cell.selected {
    border-color: transparent;
  }
}
div.cell.selected.jupyter-soft-selected {
  border-left-width: 0;
  padding-left: 6px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #42A5F5 -40px, #42A5F5 7px, #E3F2FD 7px, #E3F2FD 100%);
}
.edit_mode div.cell.selected {
  border-color: #66BB6A;
  border-left-width: 0px;
  padding-left: 6px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #66BB6A -40px, #66BB6A 5px, transparent 5px, transparent 100%);
}
@media print {
  .edit_mode div.cell.selected {
    border-color: transparent;
  }
}
.prompt {
  /* This needs to be wide enough for 3 digit prompt numbers: In[100]: */
  min-width: 14ex;
  /* This padding is tuned to match the padding on the CodeMirror editor. */
  padding: 0.4em;
  margin: 0px;
  font-family: monospace;
  text-align: right;
  /* This has to match that of the the CodeMirror class line-height below */
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  /* Don't highlight prompt number selection */
  -webkit-touch-callout: none;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -khtml-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
  /* Use default cursor */
  cursor: default;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  .prompt {
    text-align: left;
  }
}
div.inner_cell {
  min-width: 0;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  /* Old browsers */
  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
  -moz-box-flex: 1;
  box-flex: 1;
  /* Modern browsers */
  flex: 1;
}
/* input_area and input_prompt must match in top border and margin for alignment */
div.input_area {
  border: 1px solid #cfcfcf;
  border-radius: 2px;
  background: #f7f7f7;
  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* This is needed so that empty prompt areas can collapse to zero height when there
   is no content in the output_subarea and the prompt. The main purpose of this is
   to make sure that empty JavaScript output_subareas have no height. */
div.prompt:empty {
  padding-top: 0;
  padding-bottom: 0;
}
div.unrecognized_cell {
  padding: 5px 5px 5px 0px;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: horizontal;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: horizontal;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: stretch;
}
div.unrecognized_cell .inner_cell {
  border-radius: 2px;
  padding: 5px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: red;
  border: 1px solid #cfcfcf;
  background: #eaeaea;
}
div.unrecognized_cell .inner_cell a {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
div.unrecognized_cell .inner_cell a:hover {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {

div.code_cell {

@media print {

/* any special styling for code cells that are currently running goes here */
div.input {
  page-break-inside: avoid;

  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;

  display: -moz-box;

    box-orient: vertical;
    box-align: stretch;
    /* Modern browsers */
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
  }
}
/* input_area and input_prompt must match in top border and margin for alignment */
div.input_prompt {
  color: #303F9F;
  border-top: 1px solid transparent;
}
div.input_area > div.highlight {
  margin: 0.4em;
  border: none;
  padding: 0px;
  background-color: transparent;
}
div.input_area > div.highlight > pre {
  margin: 0px;
  border: none;
  padding: 0px;
  background-color: transparent;
}
/* The following gets added to the <head> if it is detected that the user has a
 * monospace font with inconsistent normal/bold/italic height.  See
 * notebookmain.js.  Such fonts will have keywords vertically offset with
 * respect to the rest of the text.  The user should select a better font.
 * See: https://github.com/ipython/ipython/issues/1503
 *
 * .CodeMirror span {
 *      vertical-align: bottom;
 * }
 */
.CodeMirror {
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  /* Changed from 1em to our global default */
  font-size: 14px;
  height: auto;
  /* Changed to auto to autogrow */
  background: none;
  /* Changed from white to allow our bg to show through */
}
.CodeMirror-scroll {
  /*  The CodeMirror docs are a bit fuzzy on if overflow-y should be hidden or visible.*/
  /*  We have found that if it is visible, vertical scrollbars appear with font size changes.*/
  overflow-y: hidden;
  overflow-x: auto;
}
.CodeMirror-lines {
  /* In CM2, this used to be 0.4em, but in CM3 it went to 4px. We need the em value because */
  /* we have set a different line-height and want this to scale with that. */
  padding: 0.4em;
}
.CodeMirror-linenumber {
  padding: 0 8px 0 4px;
}
.CodeMirror-gutters {
  border-bottom-left-radius: 2px;
  border-top-left-radius: 2px;
}
.CodeMirror pre {
  /* In CM3 this went to 4px from 0 in CM2. We need the 0 value because of how we size */
  /* .CodeMirror-lines */
  padding: 0;
  border: 0;
  border-radius: 0;
}
/*

Original style from softwaremaniacs.org (c) Ivan Sagalaev <Maniac@SoftwareManiacs.Org>
Adapted from GitHub theme

*/
.highlight-base {
  color: #000;
}

}

/* previously not defined, copying from default codemirror */

  background-position: right;

div.output_wrapper {
  /* this position must be relative to enable descendents to be absolute within it */
  position: relative;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  z-index: 1;
}
/* class for the output area when it should be height-limited */
div.output_scroll {
  /* ideally, this would be max-height, but FF barfs all over that */
  height: 24em;
  /* FF needs this *and the wrapper* to specify full width, or it will shrinkwrap */
  width: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
  border-radius: 2px;
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: block;
}
/* output div while it is collapsed */
div.output_collapsed {
  margin: 0px;
  padding: 0px;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
}
div.out_prompt_overlay {
  height: 100%;
  padding: 0px 0.4em;
  position: absolute;
  border-radius: 2px;
}
div.out_prompt_overlay:hover {
  /* use inner shadow to get border that is computed the same on WebKit/FF */
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px #000;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px #000;
  background: rgba(240, 240, 240, 0.5);
}
div.output_prompt {
  color: #D84315;
}
/* This class is the outer container of all output sections. */
div.output_area {
  padding: 0px;
  page-break-inside: avoid;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: horizontal;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: horizontal;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: stretch;
}
div.output_area .MathJax_Display {
  text-align: left !important;
}
div.output_area 
div.output_area 
div.output_area img,
div.output_area svg {
  max-width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}
div.output_area img.unconfined,
div.output_area svg.unconfined {
  max-width: none;
}
/* This is needed to protect the pre formating from global settings such
   as that of bootstrap */
.output {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  div.output_area {
    /* Old browsers */
    display: -webkit-box;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-box-align: stretch;
    display: -moz-box;
    -moz-box-orient: vertical;
    -moz-box-align: stretch;
    display: box;
    box-orient: vertical;
    box-align: stretch;
    /* Modern browsers */
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
  }
}
div.output_area pre {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  border: 0;
  vertical-align: baseline;
  color: black;
  background-color: transparent;
  border-radius: 0;
}
/* This class is for the output subarea inside the output_area and after
   the prompt div. */
div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: auto;
  padding: 0.4em;
  /* Old browsers */
  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
  -moz-box-flex: 1;
  box-flex: 1;
  /* Modern browsers */
  flex: 1;
  max-width: calc(100% - 14ex);
}
div.output_scroll div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: visible;
}
/* The rest of the output_* classes are for special styling of the different
   output types */
/* all text output has this class: */
div.output_text {
  text-align: left;
  color: #000;
  /* This has to match that of the the CodeMirror class line-height below */
  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* stdout/stderr are 'text' as well as 'stream', but execute_result/error are *not* streams */
div.output_stderr {
  background: #fdd;
  /* very light red background for stderr */
}
div.output_latex {
  text-align: left;
}
/* Empty output_javascript divs should have no height */
div.output_javascript:empty {
  padding: 0;
}
.js-error {
  color: darkred;
}
/* raw_input styles */
div.raw_input_container {
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  padding-top: 5px;
}
pre.raw_input_prompt {
  /* nothing needed here. */
}
input.raw_input {
  font-family: monospace;
  font-size: inherit;
  color: inherit;
  width: auto;
  /* make sure input baseline aligns with prompt */
  vertical-align: baseline;
  /* padding + margin = 0.5em between prompt and cursor */
  padding: 0em 0.25em;
  margin: 0em 0.25em;
}
input.raw_input:focus {
  box-shadow: none;
}
p.p-space {
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
div.output_unrecognized {
  padding: 5px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: red;
}
div.output_unrecognized a {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
div.output_unrecognized a:hover {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
.rendered_html {
  color: #000;
  /* any extras will just be numbers: */
}



.rendered_html :link {
  text-decoration: underline;
}
.rendered_html :visited {
  text-decoration: underline;
}






.rendered_html h1:first-child {
  margin-top: 0.538em;
}
.rendered_html h2:first-child {
  margin-top: 0.636em;
}
.rendered_html h3:first-child {
  margin-top: 0.777em;
}
.rendered_html h4:first-child {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html h5:first-child {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html h6:first-child {
  margin-top: 1em;
}








.rendered_html * + ul {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html * + ol {
  margin-top: 1em;
}


.rendered_html pre,



.rendered_html tr,
.rendered_html th,

.rendered_html td,


.rendered_html * + table {
  margin-top: 1em;
}

.rendered_html * + p {
  margin-top: 1em;
}

.rendered_html * + img {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html img,

.rendered_html img.unconfined,

div.text_cell {

  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;

  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: horizontal;

  display: box;
  box-orient: horizontal;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: stretch;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {

  }
}
div.text_cell_render {
  /*font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Arial, Helvetica, Geneva, sans-serif;*/
  outline: none;
  resize: none;
  width: inherit;
  border-style: none;
  padding: 0.5em 0.5em 0.5em 0.4em;
  color: #000;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
}
a.anchor-link:link {

}
h1:hover .anchor-link,
h2:hover .anchor-link,
h3:hover .anchor-link,

}
.text_cell.rendered 
.text_cell.unrendered .text_cell_render {

}
.cm-header-1,
.cm-header-2,
.cm-header-3,
.cm-header-4,
.cm-header-5,
.cm-header-6 {
  font-weight: bold;
  font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
}
.cm-header-1 {
  font-size: 185.7%;
}
.cm-header-2 {

}

  font-size: 128.6%;
}

}

  font-size: 100%;
  font-style: italic;
}
.cm-header-6 {
  font-size: 100%;
  font-style: italic;
}
</style>
<style type="text/css">.highlight .hll { background-color: #ffffcc }
.highlight  { background: #f8f8f8; }
.highlight .c { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment */
.highlight .err { border: 1px solid #FF0000 } /* Error */
.highlight .k { color: #008000; font-weight: bold } /* Keyword */
.highlight .o { color: #666666 } /* Operator */
.highlight .ch { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment.Hashbang */
.highlight .cm { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment.Multiline */
.highlight .cp { color: #BC7A00 } /* Comment.Preproc */
.highlight .cpf { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment.PreprocFile */
.highlight .c1 { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment.Single */
